document.full_text: local favorite ryan palmer, who has benefited from a more selfish approach to the game this season, charged into a four-shot lead early in friday's second round of the byron nelson championship in irving, texas.
document.title: palmer takes early control at nelson as winds strengthen
lines_and_colors: local favorite ryan palmer, who has benefited from a more selfish approach to the game this season, charged into a four-shot lead early in friday's second round of the byron nelson championship in irving, texas.
